section.title: Complete Travel Technology
section.description: Advanced AI call center features engineered specifically for Dubai travel businesses - desert safari operators, visa services, car rentals, and tourism companies.

performance_overview.title: Proven Dubai Travel Results
performance_overview.description: Real performance metrics from Dubai travel companies using our AI call center solutions

features.title: Smart Desert Safari Booking Engine
features.description: AI agents handle complete desert safari operations - availability checking, pricing calculations, hotel pickup coordination, dietary requirements, and special requests. Integrates with 50+ safari operators across Dubai desert.
capabilities: Real-time safari availability across 50+ Dubai operators
Instant pricing for morning, evening, overnight safaris
Hotel pickup coordination from all Dubai zones
Group booking management up to 100 people
Traditional entertainment and cultural activities booking

features.title: Complete Visa Requirements Assistant
features.description: AI provides instant visa guidance for all 195 countries visiting Dubai. Handles document checklists, processing timeframes, fees, and application procedures with 99% accuracy. Reduces inquiry time from 45 minutes to 3 minutes.
capabilities: Visa requirements for 195+ countries visiting Dubai

features.title: Dubai Driving & Rental Expert System
features.description: Handles all Dubai car rental complexities - license requirements, insurance options, Salik toll system, traffic regulations, and pickup logistics. Provides accurate guidance instantly with booking confirmation.
capabilities: Salik toll system guidance and card setup
Traffic fine policy and payment procedures
GPS navigation and emergency roadside assistance
Dubai traffic regulations and parking guidance

features.title: Dubai Landmark Coordination System
features.description: Creates optimized Dubai attraction packages including Burj Khalifa, Dubai Mall, Gold Souk, Marina tours with real-time availability, transportation scheduling, and timing optimization.
capabilities: Real-time availability for 25+ major Dubai attractions
Time optimization for maximum experience value

features.title: International Time Zone Coverage
features.description: Operates 24/7 Dubai time to capture international tourist calls from all global time zones. Never miss European evenings, Asian mornings, or American late-night booking inquiries.
capabilities: International call handling with cultural sensitivity
Time zone coordination for global bookings
Global payment processing and currency handling

features.title: Dubai Travel Market Intelligence
features.description: AI-powered pricing and revenue optimization using Dubai tourism patterns, seasonal demand analysis, and competitor intelligence to maximize bookings and profit margins.
capabilities: Dynamic pricing based on Dubai tourism seasons
Peak season demand forecasting and capacity planning
Last-minute deal automation and flash sales

features.title: Emergency Travel Response System
features.description: Immediate support for travel emergencies - flight changes, medical crises, weather disruptions, and family emergencies. Coordinates with airlines, hotels, insurance, and support services instantly.
capabilities: Medical emergency coordination with Dubai hospitals

features.title: Complete Regulatory Compliance System
features.description: Full adherence to UAE tourism regulations, DTCM licensing, Dubai Municipality requirements, and UAE telecommunications standards. Ensures legal operation and customer protection.
